backend/main.mo: Implements a dart scoring backend with player and game creation, turn and throw recording, and game state retrieval using in‑memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Defines metadata linking frontend files to a feature report for a themed minimal frontend shell.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of key frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a CSS variable theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, persistence, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating players and games via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind theme file using a dartboard‑inspired OKLCH palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that mounts React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: React landing page showing hero text, feature cards, and a header linking to GitHub with styled UI components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, implemented features, and pending backend feature requests for the dart scoring system.
